title: Man United On The Up Again?
description:
The FC crew assess how Erik ten Hag's first few weeks at Manchester United and debate whether he's finding the right formula for success with his new signings. Plus, Eden Hazard speaks to ESPN about moving on from his disappointing first three seasons at Real Madrid, and a new-look Bayern Munich showcase a strong start to their preseason.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Assessing Erik ten Hag's Man united side ahead of the new season; Eden Hazard ready to move on from injuries; New-look Bayern Munich's strong start
